ShortDescription: Gi Group is one of the world’s leading human capital solutions and services provider, offering services in various domains of talent acquisition and management.
enhanced_description: GI Group is a leading global human capital solutions and services provider, established in 2007. They offer a comprehensive suite of services including Temporary and Permanent Staffing, Site Managed Services, Search & Selection, Domestic & International Recruitment, Recruitment Process Optimization (RPO), Executive Search, and HR Consulting & Training. With a significant global footprint, GI Group has direct and indirect presence and strategic partnerships in approximately 57 countries across Europe, Asia, America, and Africa. A key focus is on supporting employee wellbeing, encompassing psychological safety and mental health initiatives. Their services are designed to help organizations boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, while facilitating faster and more efficient acquisition of top talent.
